name: detuned (itch)
description:
A very short experimental experience with glitch aestethic made for#GlitchJam by Paul Lawitzki (@pLawitzki), Christoph Rasulis (@brainbiteDE) and Benajmin Rudolf(@TOTALaugmented).

Press ESC to open the options menu.

* contains horror elements

Musik:
Mazurek by Doxent Zsigmond
http://ccmixter.org/files/doxent/45194
